DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety, tolerability and pharmacodynamic effects on fasting plasma glucose (FPG).
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study of BMS-823778 in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus Drug naive or on stable metformin therapy HbA1c 710% FPG â‰¤ 240mg/dL History of myocardial infarction, coronary angioplasty or bypass grafts, valvular disease or repair, unstable angina pectoris, transient ischemic attack, or cerebrovascular accidents within six months prior to entry into the study Congestive heart failure Active liver disease Impaired renal function Hepatitis C, B and HIV This list is not inclusive; additional information is provided in the protocol
